alert.note: Alert for Inland Indian River; Inland St. Lucie; Okeechobee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 3:27PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Lucie and northeastern Okeechobee Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 327 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southeast of Fort Drum, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern St. Lucie and northeastern Okeechobee Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Inland Indian River; Inland St. Lucie; Okeechobee
